title: Senate Tracker: Retired Catholic Priest Challenges Incumbent
teaser: In Wyoming, incumbent Republican Senator Mike Enzi is running for a fourth term.
contentencoded:
In this week’s Senate Tracker, we turn to the race in Wyoming, where incumbent Republican Senator Mike Enzi is running for a fourth term. His challenger is Democrat Charlie Hardy, a retired Catholic Priest.

Bob Beck from Wyoming Public Media spoke with Here & Now‘s Jeremy Hobson about the race.

  • See more in our Senate Tracker series

Guest

  • Bob Beck, news director of Wyoming Public Radio. He tweets @butterbob.
